chart.name: data
chart.description: For the use of local data

chart.name: maxColor
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with a column 3 value of maxColorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: midColor
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with a column 3 value midway between maxColorValue and minColorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: minColor
chart.description: The color for a rectangle with the column 3 value of minColorValue. Specify an HTML color value.TolorValue. Specify an HTML color value.

chart.name: maxPostDepth
chart.description: How many levels of nodes beyond maxDepth to show in 'hinted' fashion.

chart.name: showScale
chart.description: Whether or not to show a color gradient scale from minColor to maxColor along the top of the chart. Specify true to show the scale

chartTitle.name: title
chartTitle.description: title to display above the chart.
